snippet.title: Prinny Presents NIS Classics Vol. 2 - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PC)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ nisamerica.com/NIS-Classics/vol-2

In Prinny Presents NIS Classics Vol. 2, two action-packed RPGs are making their first explosive entrances since their decade-plus debuts, dood! Custom-build your perfect hero to save the day in ZHP: Unlosing Ranger VS Darkdeath Evilman, and dominate the battlefield by the book (or rather, AS a book) in Makai Kingdom. This double-dose of NIS goodness is coming Spring 2022 to Nintendo Switch and PC!

#NISClassics #NISAmerica #ZettaiHeroProject #MakaiKingdom
